alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Another strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Georgetown and southern Horry Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 349 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just west of Murrells Inlet, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Surfside Beach, Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Plantersville, Burgess, Yauhannah and Waccamaw Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown
